duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform difficult mechanical, electrical, and refrigeration and air-conditioning repairs on plant machinery and equipment.
Read and understand detailed machine drawings and electrical blueprints.
Maintain job documentation with accuracy and timeliness.
Keep a clean and orderly working environment after maintenance work.
Repair and install castable in hearths, furnace doors, fluid beds, and arches.
Assist in moving furniture, equipment, or other machinery using special rigging or heavy-duty moving equipment.
Repair equipment with electric or gas welding, cutting metal with torches as necessary.
Repair pneumatic and hydraulic equipment, including regulators, controls, and cylinders.
Certify all temperature measuring units in use.
Handle hazardous waste, including neutralization and discharge of waste water, muriatic acid, hydrofluoric acid, and other wastes.

education_certification.credential: Minimum of two (2) years on the job training as a Maintenance Person, Labor Grade 3, or equivalent experience.
